summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce Review Date: 2020/04/03 Store: Bioré Product Description: ['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'} Review Text: The Bioré Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is slightly like a watery jelly texture and goes on smoothly for washing away dirt and makeup on your face. You simply pump some of the cleaner in the palm of your hand and then massage it gently on your face to clear away the makeup - then rinse your whole face with water. The scent is mild but very nice. When finished you will not feel any sticky residue. I love the guard on the pump that allows you to put it on the pump when you are not using it so little fingers cannot spread the jelly around when you are not looking nor can the pump squirt out when the bottle falls over or when you are traveling. This product was made in Japan. Review Title: Love The Guard For The Cap Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce Review Date: 2020/04/03 Store: Bioré Product Description: ['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'} Review Text: Biore Cleansing Oil Makeup Removing Cloths come in a package like most wipes and have a pull tab on the top to open and close the packet. There are 44 wipes in each packet and each wipe is about 4.5 x 5.5 inches (you probably would need 2 or 3 wipes a time if you wear a lot of makeup) and is pre-moisturized. These wipes are to be deposed in the garbage not the toilet and are not to be close to your eyes. Directions state that you should place the cloth on the area that has make-up for about 5 seconds and then wipe off. The scent smells very nice and my skin did feel smooth when done. This product was made in Japan Review Title: Nice Case For Traveling Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MAD | Cosmetic's Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes, Daily cleansing face wipes to remove waterproof mascara, alcohol free , with Vitamin E 25 count Review Date: 2020/10/25 Store: JUST FOR TOTS BY MAD Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'JUST FOR TOTS BY MAD', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Unit Count': '25.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '6.3 x 7.87 x 1.97 inches; 7.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '685757511926'} Review Text: These "Cosmetic's Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes" are about 7.5 inches by 6.5 Inches and the fabric is sturdy and also a bit stretchy. It is difficult trying to get the wipes out of the package as the opening is too small. These wipes are slightly scented and I found the scent to not be pleasant. Once I had the wipe in my hands and on my face I could not get rid of the smell - not even when I washed both hands and face with my favorite body gel - there was still a bit of the wipe's fragrance. The wipes are infused with Vitamin E and made with Argan oil and Hyaluronic. This product is alcohol free and is moistened to just the right level so it not dripping when taken out the package. Do not dispose these in the toilet. I think this product is made in Hong Kong but not sure of that. Review Title: Do Not Dispose In Toilet Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: TCM Mancode 101 Men's Hair Conditioner 16oz Review Date: 2020/10/27 Store: TCM Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'TCM', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'UPC': '851058008421'} Review Text: The "TCM Mancode 101 Men's Hair Conditioner" has a very nice scent, not overpowering just right. I had my husband try the conditioner following all the direction. The directions have you shampooing your hair and towel dry, then taking a palm sized amount to massage ( I think that is more than you need) from ends to scalp. Then comb with wide tooth comb from the scalp upward to the ends and let it stay in for 5 minutes ( this is a negative to me ...5 minutes waiting is too long). Finally rinse thoroughly and style. It is infused with tea tree oil and Chia seed oil. My husband agreed with my thoughts on amount of product and time. He thought it was just okay, nothing fantastic. The product comes in a metal container - the one I received not dings and creases on the outside but no damage in the inside of container. Review Title: Nice Scent Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Christmas Headbands for Women,Glitter headbands Sequence Red and Green,Holiday Costume Headwear Handmade Mouse Ears Hairband Hair Decorations for Girl Party Cosplay Favor Accessories Review Date: 2020/12/17 Store: YanJie Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Christmas, Party, Birthday, Thanksgiving', 'Material': 'Cotton Blend', 'Brand': 'YanJie', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 6 x 0.2 inches; 0.9 Ounces', 'UPC': '751300682143'} Review Text: Christmas Headband for women and older girls are cute and colorful, but a bit pricey. They seem to be well made except for the glue that oozed out of the white ears into the headband. Luckily it only show when not on someone's head. I wish the headband itself was a bit wider so that it would fit more secure on your head. Review Title: Cute & Colorful Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: EVITA PERONI Natural Sandalwood Beech Wooden Hair Brush - Detangling Paddle Hairbrush for Thick fine Curly Straight Dry and Damaged Hair - Unisex Gift for Women Men Kids Girls Review Date: 2021/01/15 Store: EVITA PERONI Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '11.3 x 5.4 x 2.4 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': '70334 159', 'Manufacturer': 'EVITA PERONI'} Review Text: The EVITA PERONI Wooden Hair Brush is a detangling paddle hairbrush. it is 2.8" wide and 7.8" long of natural beech wood. It should be useful for any kind of hair that needs detangling. There are seven rows of wooden bristles that have rounded heads. The bristles are inserted in a silicon padding which allows for a little give and movement.

I would have given this brush a higher rating but the product page for this brush states that it comes with a cloth pouch and a black rake to clean the brush. Neither of those items came with my brush. The only other item in the box was a empty black thin plastic pad with "Touch-Fashion Jewelry Co. LTD" written on it but nothing else. See above. Review Title: Only A Brush Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Hair Scrunchies for Girls Hair Ties 7PCS Candy Color Hair Accessories Luminous Hair Scrunchies Bands Soft Elastic Scrunchies Satin Soft Hair Scruchy Natural Glow Only in the Dark Night Hair Accessories for Women and Girls Review Date: 2021/02/26 Store: DOTKV Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Color': 'Yellow,Orange,Blue,Green,White,Purple', 'Material': 'Satin', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'DOTKV', 'Hair Type': 'All, normal', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 4.33 x 1.97 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '194852280144'} Review Text: These hair scrunchies for girls come in a seven piece package. They are made of a very soft fabric that is something like chenille and they come in seven different soft pastel colors. They are about 2.5 inches in diameter. The elastic holding the fabric appears to be strong. The sad part of this is that the scrunchies are supposed to be luminous in the dark night which my granddaughters were excited about and not one of the scrunchies was luminous no matters what we tried. Review Title: Not Luminous Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
The purchase history indicates a strong preference for skincare and makeup removal products, particularly those with gentle, non-greasy formulations and mild fragrances. The individual favors Japanese beauty products, as evidenced by repeated purchases from a specific brand known for effective cleansing solutions. 

Travel-friendly packaging and practical design features, such as protective caps and easy-to-use applicators, are frequently highlighted. There is a noticeable interest in wipes and cleansing cloths, though the variability in experience indicates a preference for certain brands over others based on scent and effectiveness.

Additionally, the purchases suggest a focus on hair care, with an inclination toward products that offer a pleasant scent and are infused with beneficial ingredients. However, feedback reveals some dissatisfaction with product performance, particularly regarding specific features or expected benefits that were not met.

Lastly, there is an interest in colorful accessories, particularly for festive occasions, suggesting a enjoyment in aesthetics and fashion as well. The feedback often reflects a blend of appreciation for quality alongside disappointment in execution, indicating a discerning consumer mindset.

target_interaction.title: Works Wonderfully
target_interaction.text: I am trying to train my short hair to go over my ear while I what for it to grow longer. gpt2b glued spray wax has worked wonderfully. There is no scent and the spray is light so you don't feel it . The spray top has two nozzles - one for flexible texture and one for a structured hold (which is the one I am using now). It holds my hair in place for about 4 hours and then my strands of my  hair starts to  come out and escape from behind my ear. All I have to do is dampen the palm of my hand with a little water and run my hand over the hair and it goes right back to where I want it to be.
target_interaction.title_meta: Got2b Glued Spray Wax with 2-in-1 Dual Nozzle, 8 oz
features: One product for two different looks
Customize your hold by turning the dual actuator
Turn to position 1 for flexible texture
Turn to position 2 for structured hold
Lightweight formula that doesn't leave your hair feeling sticky or crunchy
description: The first dual-finish spray wax has officially hit the shelves! The got2b glued Spray Wax provides two looks with one product. So whether you want flexible texture or structured hold, this product has you covered! Best of all, this lightweight formula doesn’t leave your hair feeling sticky or crunchy. Create your own look and style. Turn to position 1 for flexible texture, turn to position 2 for structured hold. Be whoever you want 2b with got2b glued Spray Wax!

videos.title: So light but yet so powerful.
Does It Really Work? Watch This For More ACTION, Less Talk
How-to Use got2b glued Spray Wax 2-in-1 Dual Spray Nozzle
GOT 2B Glued Blasting Freeze Spray - Honest Testimonial!
Watch before you buy - Got2B Spray
Watch Before You Buy! Does This Scarf Really Lay Your Edges?
